text: Aniruddh Ram Tiwari (born 27 September 1989) also known as Das Aniruddh or simply Aniruddhacharya, is an Indian spiritual leader and story-teller. Additionally, he is the founder of Gauri Gopal Ashram in Vrindavan. Several memes have been created on social media based on his statements. ==Reference== == Other websites == * Category:1989 births Category:Living people Category:People from Madhya Pradesh Category:Indian spiritual teachers Category:Indian Hindus
title: Aniruddhacharya
